title: Bring Me To Life
lyrics:
(Em)How can you (C)see into my (Am)eyes
Like open (D)doors
(Em)Leading you (C)down into my (Am)core
Where I've be(D)come so numb
(Em) Without a (C)soul
(Am) My spirits (D)sleeping somewhere (Em)cold
Until you (C)find it there and (Am)lead
It (D)back (Em-stop)home

[chorus]
(Em)(Wake me up) Wake me up inside (I (G)can’t wake up) Wake me up inside
(D)(Save me) Call my name and (C)save me from the (Em)dark
(Wake me up) Bid my blood to run (I (G)can’t wake up) Before I come un(D)done
(Save me) Save me from the (C)nothing I've be(Am)come
Bring (D)me to (Em)life (Em)
(Em)Now that I (C)know what I'm with(Am)out
You cant just (D)leave me
(Em)Breath into (C)me
And make me (Am)real
Bring (D)me to (Em)life

[chorus]
(Em)(Wake me up) Wake me up inside (I (G)can’t wake up) Wake me up inside
(D)(Save me) Call my name and (C)save me from the (Em)dark
(Wake me up) Bid my blood to run (I (G)can’t wake up) Before I come un(D)done
(Save me) Save me from the (C)nothing I've be(Am)come
Bring (D)me to (Em)life (I've been living a lie, there's nothing inside)
(Am) Bring (D)me to (Em)life
 
(Am)Frozen in(G)side without your (B7)touch
Without your (Em)love darling
(Am)Only (G)you are the (B7)life among the dead (B7 - 5 down strums)
 
[him] (Em)All this time, I can't believe I couldn't see
          (Em) Kept in the dark, but you were there in front of me
[her] (C) I've been sleeping a thousand years, it seems
          (D) Got to open my eyes to everything
[him] (Em) Without a thought, without a voice, without a soul
[her] (Em) Don't let me die here
                        ([him] there must be (C)something more)
[her] Bring (D)me to (Em)life

[chorus - straight after]
(Em)(Wake me up) Wake me up inside (I (G)can’t wake up) Wake me up inside
(D)(Save me) Call my name and (C)save me from the (Em)dark
(Wake me up) Bid my blood to run (I (G)can’t wake up) Before I come un(D)done
(Save me) Save me from the (C)nothing I've be(Am)come
Bring (D)me to (Em)life
(C) Bring (D)me to (Em)life
(C) Bring (D)me to (Em-single strum)life [end]
